## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> independent information on a fixup kind.

</EnumerationListItem>

<EnumerationListItem name="FKF_IsAlignedDownTo32Bits">
Should this fixup kind force a 4-byte aligned effective PC value? (= (1 &lt;&lt; 1))
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationListItem>

### Name {#a2fe93ffd2107b04ad99c00d56cfc380c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const char&#42; llvm::MCFixupKindInfo::Name</>}>
A target specific name for the fixup kind.

The names will be unique for distinct kinds on any given target.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfixupkindinfo-h/#l00035">35</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfixupkindinfo-h">MCFixupKindInfo.h</a>.

### TargetSize {#acfcb94e2996dda3707eaa1eb1cb79f80}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::MCFixupKindInfo::TargetSize">
The number of bits written by this fixup.

The bits are assumed to be contiguous.
